title: Delirium
description: Horror novelist Steve Stryker convinces himself his unfaithful wife, Arlene, is now sleeping with his psychiatrist Dr. Heinrich Goldenthal, and that the two of them are plotting to drive him insane and have him committed. Sinister characters from his novels have accosted him, threatened him. Are these hired actors? Or hallucinations? Has skilled hypnotherapist Dr. Goldenthal planted ideas in Steveâ€™s head? Could it be that he has been surreptitiously dosed with mind-altering drugs?
author: Grant Robinson
